DESCRIPTION: Burned creatures increase the damage of the players next attack when damaged and #yBurn is removed.
#yDraconic cards have their damage and #yBlock values increased by #yDragonscales. NL #yDraconic Sigils have their values increased by #yDragonscales
#yScarlet #yRot increases damage from taken from #yPoison #b%50. NL Additional #yPoison damage dealt is spread to all other enemies.
When a creature obtains #b15 #yFrostbite they take #b35 damage and gain #b2 #yWeak and #yVulnerable
Places a #yDragonic Sigil on this cards target, if a type is specified it will be created otherwise your least recent Sigil will be moved.
Places a #yDraconic Sigil on the player, if a type is specified that type will be created otherwise the Sigil will be moved from this cards target.
#yDraconic #ySigil ; NL #Scale #yPassive : Grants #yVigor. NL #ySurge #yPassive : Damages it's owner.
#yDraconic #ySigil ; NL #Scale #yPassive : Damages the enemy you last targeted directly. NL #ySurge #yPassive : Mark of Mana #yScales damage this marks owner.
#yDraconic #ySigil ; NL #Scale #yPassive : Grants #yBlock. NL #ySurge #yPassive : Applies Frostbite to it's owner.
#yDraconic #ySigil ; NL #Scale #yPassive : Applies #yPoison to random enemies. NL #ySurge #yPassive : Applies #yRot to it's owner.
#yDraconic #ySigil ; NL #Scale #yPassive : Damages random enemies and increases #ySurge power. NL #ySurge #yPassive : Damages all enemies and grants #yBlock
